headline.main: CHURCH LEADERS DISCUSS U.S. ROLE; Part Nation Will Play at the Peace Table Held Uppermost in Most Minds Abroad

lead_paragraph: The cooperation that the people of the United States will give to an established peace at the end of the present war is uppermost in the minds of church leaders abroad in the midst of the current conflict, according to views expressed yesterday at a conference of leaders of Protestant denominations in this area.
abstract: Joint meeting with World Conf on Faith and Order

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: FAITH AND ORDER, WORLD CONF ON
